price: Kuma ya buga Mana wani misãli, kuma ya manta da halittarsa, ya ce: "Wãne ne ke rãyar da ƙasũsuwa alhãli kuwa sunã rududdugaggu?"
arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waḍaraba lanā mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qāla man yuḥ'yī al-ʿiẓāma wahiya ramīmun
